title: In a given year, Jennifer earns $50,000 and spe...

content.description: In a given year, Jennifer earns $50,000 and spends $40,000. During the same period, Steve earns $30,000 and spends $27,000.
content.question: If Jennifer and Steve both must pay a 10 percent sales tax on goods purchased, the sales tax is

choices.label: a higher percentage of income for Jennifer than for Steve
a higher percentage of spending for Steve than for Jennifer

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
